name: React UI CI

on:
    workflow_call:
        inputs:
            ui-path:
                required: true
                type: string

jobs:
    build:
        runs-on: ubuntu-latest
        steps:
            - uses: actions/checkout@v4
            - name: Set up Node
              uses: actions/setup-node@v4
              with:
                node-version: "22"
            - name: Lint UI
              run: |
                cd ${{ inputs.ui-path }}
                npm install # TODO: use npm ci and introduce package-lock.json
                npm run lint
